answers.answer: Hello,Burning inside stomach and feeling of nausea and vomiting are due to acid reflux and gastritis.It is good that you are already taking zantac for it.But you can introduce some changes in your life style as well. Eat small nutritious meals at frequent intervals instead of a heavy single meal. Exercise frequently and take your dinner atleast 2 hrs prior to bedtime. Also raise the head end of the bed by 2 blocks. To help control the stomach acid, one should not drink alcohol or drinks with caffeine in them, or eat chocolate or spicy or greasy foods .Secondly,burning sensation in penis and blood in urine are due to UTI(urinary tract infections) or kidney disorders(stones,infections,inflammation)and not due to some allergies.You have already taken the course of antibiotics for it.Did you get a urine examination and culture and ultrasound lower abdomen done?Thirdly,these tingling and needle sensations are called parasthesia. Parasthesias are common in alcoholics and metabolic disorders like diabetes, hypothyroidism, and hypoparathyroidismThey can also be due to peripheral vascular disease, vitamin B12 deficiency or malnutrition.Get your blood sugar and thyroid hormones levels evaluated. You can take some vit B12 for some days and see if the tingling is gone or not.In case the symptoms persist then pls consult a neurologist as it can be due to some neurological disorder. Common disorders causing paraesthesias are rheumatoid arthritis and carpal tunnel syndrome transient ischemic attack, motor neurone disease, or autoimmune disorders like multiple sclerosis or lupus erythematosus. A diagnostic evaluation by a doctor is necessary to rule these out.Treatment will depend on the diagnosis.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing or if you have any additional doubts.
